Made together with ðŸ¤¡\'s and ðŸ§ \'s by \n

Elkana Sampath \n
Boris Misquitta \n
Mitali Haldankar \n
Aniruddha Khandekar \n
Celestyn Kinny

Option: DEC (Decimal) \n
Type - Input & Output \n
Option to set input format to simple positive integers or to convert any input format to simple positive integers

Option: HEX (Hexadecimal) \n
Type - Input & Output \n
Option to set input format to base 16 or to convert any input format to base 16

Option: OCT (Octal) \n
Type - Input & Output \n
Option to set input format to base 8 or to convert any input format to base 8

Option: BIN (Binary) \n
Type - Input & Output \n
Option to set input format to base 2 or to convert any input format to base 2

Option: ROM (Roman) \n
Type - Only Output \n
Option to convert any input format to the corresponding roman numeral

Option: Image Encryption of Input \n
Type - Only Output \n
Upon pressing the button Cipher Input, the input entered will be encrypted by images. \n
Encryption will be done according to the options selected in settings.
